    </li>

    <li>
      <a target="_blank" class="dropdown-item py-2 d-flex gap-2 w-max-content" href="https://www.google.com/calendar/render?action=TEMPLATE&amp;text=Collecte%20Les%20Jardins%20du%20Port&amp;dates=20190813T020000/20190813T030000&amp;ctz=Europe/Paris&amp;details=Investissez%20d%C3%A8s%201%E2%82%AC%20dans%20une%20op%C3%A9ration%20de%20la%20cr%C3%A9ation%20de%20jardins%20potagers%20individuels%20%C3%A0%20Hy%C3%A8res%20%2883%29%20pour%20une%20dur%C3%A9e%20maximale%20de%208%20mois%20et%20au%20taux%20de%208%2C50%25%20l%27an%0A%0Ahttps%3A%2F%2Fapp.lapremierebrique.fr%2Ffr%2Fprojects%2F20">
        <img width="24" height="24" src="https://d1jdllyufjkaos.cloudfront.net/assets/icons/google_agenda-bef803806af05d8f21e84a2ff7ffa30dbbef718c5b8df8cb9447179d8190f55b.svg">
        <span>Google Agenda</span>
</a>    </li>

    <li>
      <a target="_blank" class="dropdown-item py-2 d-flex gap-2 w-max-content" href="https://outlook.live.com/calendar/0/deeplink/compose?path=/calendar/action/compose&amp;rru=addevent&amp;subject=Collecte%20Les%20Jardins%20du%20Port&amp;startdt=2019-08-13T00:00:00Z&amp;enddt=2019-08-13T01:00:00Z&amp;body=Investissez%20d%C3%A8s%201%E2%82%AC%20dans%20une%20op%C3%A9ration%20de%20la%20cr%C3%A9ation%20de%20jardins%20potagers%20individuels%20%C3%A0%20Hy%C3%A8res%20%2883%29%20pour%20une%20dur%C3%A9e%20maximale%20de%208%20mois%20et%20au%20taux%20de%208%2C50%25%20l%27an%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3Ehttps%3A%2F%2Fapp.lapremierebrique.fr%2Ffr%2Fprojects%2F20">
        <img width="24" height="24" src="https://d1jdllyufjkaos.cloudfront.net/assets/icons/outlook_agenda-88a14256f7d374abb8535bbe15973976b5793853d4187516461b4a1904a82132.svg">
        Outlook
</a>    </li>

    <li>
      <a target="_blank" class="dropdown-item py-2 d-flex gap-2 w-max-content" href="data:text/calendar;charset=utf8,BEGIN:VCALENDAR%0AVERSION:2.0%0ABEGIN:VEVENT%0ADTSTART:20190813T000000Z%0ADTEND:20190813T010000Z%0ASUMMARY:Collecte%20Les%20Jardins%20du%20Port%0AURL:https%3A%2F%2Fapp.lapremierebrique.fr%2Ffr%2Fprojects%2F20%0ADESCRIPTION:Investissez%20d%C3%A8s%201%E2%82%AC%20dans%20une%20op%C3%A9ration%20de%20la%20cr%C3%A9ation%20de%20jardins%20potagers%20individuels%20%C3%A0%20Hy%C3%A8res%20%2883%29%20pour%20une%20dur%C3%A9e%20maximale%20de%208%20mois%20et%20au%20taux%20de%208%5C%2C50%25%20l%27an\n\nhttps%3A%2F%2Fapp.lapremierebrique.fr%2Ffr%2Fprojects%2F20%0AUID:-https%3A%2F%2Fapp.lapremierebrique.fr%2Ffr%2Fprojects%2F20%0AEND:VEVENT%0AEND:VCALENDAR">
        <img width="24" height="24" src="https://d1jdllyufjkaos.cloudfront.net/assets/icons/apple_calendar-8ab2b6f0377e08de22b8a692895037871e7d22d4445a91398ff9224850afdaf1.svg">
        iCal
</a>    </li>
  </ul>
</div>

    </div>

    <div class="col-12 col-md-6 border border-middle-grey rounded px-3">
      <div id="projectCover" class="text-center project-img mb-3 mb-md-0 mt-3 rounded position-relative" style="background: center / cover no-repeat url(https://d1jdllyufjkaos.cloudfront.net/derivations/image/large/700/500/eyJpZCI6InByb2plY3QvMjAvY292ZXJfcGljdHVyZS83MTgzZjVjY2U4MWRjZWQzNGE5YzliZWY1MjM2YmRjOS5wbmciLCJzdG9yYWdlIjoic3RvcmUifQ?signature=7f5a10b6d45bf9f5770bba863b3f726a50494ebc4bdc42f26bc0e2741dd214b9)">
          <img height="33" width="146" class="project-status-show" alt="Image représentant le statut du projet" src="https://d1jdllyufjkaos.cloudfront.net/assets/projects/refunded-daa18dbf296148f1f734496c6d2df35fe0a30aee89a55d8555d9b8adb2f8faa6.svg">

      </div>

      <ul class="nav nav-project border-bottom border-middle-grey mx-n2 justify-content-center justify-content-sm-start mt-3 mx-sm-0" role="tablist">
        <li class="nav-item" role="presentation">
          <a class="nav-link active border border-middle-grey border-bottom-0" data-bs-toggle="pill" href="#projectPresentation" aria-selected="true" role="tab">
            Présentation
          </a>
        </li>


        <li class="align-self-center ms-auto">
          <div class="d-none d-lg-flex align-items-center gap-3">

            <button class="unset-btn-appearance" data-bs-toggle="modal" data-bs-target="#shareLinkModal">
              <img height="24" width="24" alt="Icône de partage" src="https://d1jdllyufjkaos.cloudfront.net/assets/icons/share-e6d136cab3f4cce4a4d2bef295ed0d15c86b5204887c8fcd4246b654e3fd0e95.svg">
            </button>
          </div>
        </li>
      </ul>

      <div class="tab-content px-3">
        <div class="tab-pane fade in active show" id="projectPresentation" role="tabpanel">
              <p class="fw-semibold"></p>
              <h3>Présentation globale du projet</h3><p>Acquisition d’un terrain de près de 4.000 m² sur la commune de Hyères (83), entre le port et le centre-ville, pour y réaliser une opération originale d'aménagement&nbsp; d'un foncier en jardins potagers partagés.&nbsp;Une opération dans l'air du temps ! </p><p>Le projet est porté par deux associés, Bastien et Jean, promoteurs et marchands chevronnés de la région qui ont souhaité réaliser une opération coup de cœur et écologique.&nbsp;Le projet est&nbsp;réalisé via une société dédiée à ce programme, la SAS Les Jardins du Port.</p><h3>Eléments financiers</h3><p>Coût total : 287.510 €</p><p>Marge prévisionnelle totale : 271.063 €</p><p>Clôture prévue du programme : septembre 2020</p>
        </div>

      </div>
    </div>

    <div class="col-12 col-md-6 px-0 px-md-4">
      <div class="card border-0 mb-3 bg-body-secondary">
        <div class="card-body z-0 p-0">
          <h1 class="h3 fw-bold">Les Jardins du Port</h1>
          <h2 class="h6 fw-normal"> Investissez dès 1€ dans une opération de la création de jardins potagers individuels à Hyères (83) pour une durée maximale de 8 mois et au taux de 8,50% l'an</h2>

          <table class="table mb-0">
            <tbody><tr class="z-n1 safari-z-index-fix">
              <td class="text-center d-flex p-4 bg-body-secondary">
                <div class="progressbar-wrapper mx-auto"><div class="progressbar"><div class="side front"><div class="bar" style="width: 100.0%"></div></div><div class="side right"></div><div class="side back"><div class="bar" style="width: 100.0%"></div></div><div class="side top"><div class="bar" style="width: 100.0%"></div></div><div class="side bottom"><div class="bar" style="width: 100.0%"></div></div><div class="side left"></div></div></div>
              </td>
                <td class="bg-body-secondary">
                  <span class="fw-bold">
                    75 000 €
                  </span>
                  <span class="text-dark-grey">
                    collectés
                  </span>
                </td>
            </tr>
            <tr>
              <td class="text-center bg-body-secondary">
                <img height="44" width="66" alt="Icône représentant le montant maximum d'investissement" src="https://d1jdllyufjkaos.cloudfront.net/assets/invest/performance-cafaa5cb58eb60b4eb7bf42ceb075437dea9d9a8af399227f02d37756d0fc841.svg">
              </td>
              <td class="bg-body-secondary">
                <span class="fw-bold">
                  0,00 €
                </span>
                <span class="text-dark-grey">
                  maximum
                </span>
              </td>
            </tr>
            <tr>
                <td class="text-center bg-body-secondary">
                  <img height="44" width="66" alt="Icône représentant un investisseur" src="https://d1jdllyufjkaos.cloudfront.net/assets/projects/investors-27bd19ded316a20796fd6adeb0f1baa6426cd9ded2d58e5fc493080abb5c2bc4.svg">
                </td>
                <td class="bg-body-secondary">
                  <span class="fw-bold">
                    21
                  </span>
                  <span class="text-dark-grey">
                    investisseurs
                  </span>
                </td>
            </tr>
            <tr>
              <td class="text-center bg-body-secondary">
                <img height="44" width="66" alt="Icône représentant la rentabilité du projet" src="https://d1jdllyufjkaos.cloudfront.net/assets/projects/interests_rate-b69e7e766485722fd5a326beedd589b8064a53c3821ba2b6f3a4f7cf3238f488.svg">
              </td>
              <td class="bg-body-secondary">
                <span class="fw-bold">
                  9,00%
                </span>
                <span class="text-dark-grey">
                  l'an sur 8 mois
                </span>

                <span data-bs-toggle="popover" data-bs-html="true" data-bs-content="Par prudence, nous affichons toujours la durée maximale qui est la durée estimée en hypothèse pessimiste. <a rel=&quot;noopener noreferrer nofollow&quot; target=&quot;_blank&quot; href=&quot;https://lapremierebrique.crisp.help/fr//article/quels-sont-les-delais-de-remboursement-ou-versement-des-interets-pour-les-investisseurs-11s1k2l/#2-color193366comprendre-la-duree-dun-projet-sur-la-premiere-brique&quot;>En savoir plus sur les délais de remboursement</a>">
  <svg width="14" height="14" viewBox="0 0 20 20" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="text-primary align-text-top">

              </td>
            </tr>
          </tbody></table>
        </div>
      </div>

          <div class="border border-middle-grey p-3 rounded">
            <p class="mb-0">
              Ce projet est financé ! Découvrez tous les <a href="/fr/projects" class="font-weight-semibold">projets de La Première Brique</a>.

    <div class="pt-16 pt-lg-0"></div>
    
      <script src="https://d1jdllyufjkaos.cloudfront.net/assets/subscription_simulator-849cc7fa177e6d346f832d4d298ad3d5731d1925bb0e2a2cb91cb128d1ee6782.js" defer="defer"></script>
  <script type="text/javascript">
    window.dataLayer = window.dataLayer || [];
    window.dataLayer.push({
      event: "vue_projet",
      project_id: "20",
      typology: "Marchand de biens",
      targeted_amount: "75 000,00 €"
    });

    document.querySelectorAll('a[data-event="telechargement_document"]').forEach(function (link) {
      link.addEventListener("click", function () {
        window.dataLayer = window.dataLayer || [];
        window.dataLayer.push({
          event: "telechargement_document",
          project_id: this.dataset.projectId,
          document_name: this.dataset.documentName
        });
      });
    });
